title: Protein-ligand docking
questions: How can I perform a simple docking workflow in Galaxy?
objectives: Create a small compound library using the ChEMBL database
Dock a variety of ligands to the active site of the Hsp90 protein
key_points: Docking allows 'virtual screening' of drug candidates
Molecular fingerprints encode features into a bitstring
The ChemicalToolbox contains many tools for cheminformatics analysis

workflows.name: CTB Workflow
workflows.title: CTB Workflow

history.message: editing the workflow using the workflow editor

workflows.graph_dot:
digraph main {
  node [fontname="Atkinson Hyperlegible", shape=box, color=white,style=filled,color=peachpuff,margin="0.2,0.2"];

  13[label="Remove duplicated molecules"]

  29[label="Filter"]
  19 -> 29 [label="outfile"]
  30[label="Compound Convert"]
  19 -> 30 [label="outfile"]
  31[label="Molecules to Fingerprints"]
  19 -> 31 [label="outfile"]
  39[label="Natural Product"]
  29 -> 39 [label="outfile"]
  40[label="Molecules to Fingerprints"]
  29 -> 40 [label="outfile"]
